sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词语都可表示"发生"之意。
means: happen ： 普通用词，泛指一切客观事物或情况的发生，强调动作的偶然性。
occur ： 较正式用词，可指意外地发生，也可指意料中的发生。
chance ： 侧重事前无安排或无准备而发生的事，特指巧合。
take place ： 多指通过人为安排的发生。

sentence.Network_en: If these drugs are stopped abruptly then some withdrawal symptoms may occur.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果突然停服这些药，则可能出现一些戒断症状。

sentence.Network_en: Keep a pad handy to jot down queries as they occur.
sentence.Network_cn: 手边放一本便笺簿，以便有问题时随时记下。

sentence.Network_en: Nitrates are chemicals that occur naturally in water and the soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 硝酸盐是水和土壤中自然存在的化学物质。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... incursion a 侵入，袭击 occur n 发生，出现 occurrence v 出现，产生.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... incursion a 侵入，袭击 occur n 发生，出现 occurrence v 出现，产生.
星火英语四级词汇表·巧记·速记·精练 - 豆丁网 ... incur vt. 招致 occur vi. 发生;存在于;被想到 occurrence n. 发生的事情;出现.
雅思阅读超高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... mould n. 模具 v.铸造 138 occur vi. 发生, 存在 occurrence n. 发生, 事件 139.

list.abs: 穿越火线里的爆头和连杀的英文是什么？_百度知道 ... 3，Multi Kill（ 多连杀） 4，occur kill（ 突然杀） 2，double kill( 双连杀).
surface observatory 水面观测站surface occurence 地表显示；地面产状；地表露头surface of adherence 粘附面
考博英语词汇 ... object to 反对；抗议；不支持 occur to 突然想到(一个主意等) off and on 时而；断断续续地.
where the accident occurred is unknown ., 事故发生的地方还不知道.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin occurrere 'go to meet, present itself', from ob- 'against' + currere 'to run'

encyclopedia.content: 阿 occur:[ə'kə:] vi. 珂 1、发生 2、发现，被发现；存在 3、被想到，被想起 occur 指“发生”时可与 happen 换用，但后接to sb./sth.时，两者含义不同：occur to sb./sth. 指某种思想等呈现于某人的知觉中。

example.ex: If headaches only occur at night, lack of fresh air and oxygen is often the cause...
example.tran: 如果只是在晚上头疼，那常常是由于缺乏新鲜空气和氧气的缘故。

example.ex: The crash occurred when the crew shut down the wrong engine...
example.tran: 机务人员关错了引擎，随即飞机坠毁。

entry.def: When something occurs in a particular place, it exists or is present there.

example.ex: The cattle disease occurs more or less anywhere in Africa where the fly occurs...
example.tran: 在非洲凡是有这种蝇虫的地方，几乎都会出现这一牛病。

example.ex: These snails do not occur on low-lying coral islands or atolls.
example.tran: 在地势低平的珊瑚岛或环礁上没有这种螺。

entry.tran: （想法或主意）被想到，被想起，浮现于脑海中
entry.def: If a thought or idea occurs to you, you suddenly think of it or realize it.

example.ex: It did not occur to me to check my insurance policy...
example.tran: 我没有想到要核实我的保险单条款。

example.ex: It occurred to me that I could have the book sent to me...
example.tran: 我想到可以让人把书寄给我。

sentences.sentence: "The meeting took place off without an incidence"

means.word_mean: 2. come to one's mind; suggest itself;

sentences.sentence: "It occurred to me that we should hire another secretary"
"A great idea then came to her"
"precious stones occur in a large area in Brazil"

auth_sentence.content: Here some rain can occur all the year round.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here some rain can occur all the year round.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here some rain can occur all the year round.

auth_sentence.content: They also occur on a number of oceanic islands.
auth_sentence.res_content: They also occur on a number of oceanic islands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also occur on a number of oceanic islands.

auth_sentence.content: There are a number of contingencies which could occur.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are a number of contingencies which could occur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are a number of contingencies which could occur.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =care,表示"关心"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正确无误的;准确的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac再+cur关心+ate……的→再关心,弄精确为止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好奇的, 求知的, 古怪的, 爱挑剔的

stems_affixes.word_buile: accurate[[adj.正确无误的;准确的,精确的]]→n.准确[性];精确;准确度
cur关心+io→珍贵的被人多加关心的东西
cur关心+iosity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
con共同+cur跑,发生,快速做……→共同跑→共同发生
in进入+cur跑,发生,快速做……→跑进来→招惹

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现;存在;想起,想到
stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向+cur跑,发生,快速做……→某个方向跑,发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: [尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+cur跑,发生,快速做……→再次跑来

Sentence.sentence: The accident occurred in Riverside California.
Further evidence of McLaughlin's irresponsibility occurred on May 6 when he was returning from his shift
Very rarely do any violent crimes actually occur.
In 1976, congress enacted the latest copy right law, taking into consideration the technological developments that had occurred since the passage of the copy right act of 1909.
Reinforcement occurs when we receive direct or indirect rewards or punishments for particular gender role behaviors.
Social learning theories contribute to our understanding of why we behave as we do, but much of the emphasis is on early socialization rather than on what occurs throughout life

means.word_mean: 发生; 举行; 存在

sentences.en: I hope this won't occur again.
sentences.cn: 我希望不要再发生这种事情。

sentences.en: The word “gratitude” did not occur in his words.
sentences.cn: “感激”两字在他的话中是见不到的。

sentences.en: It never occurred to me that he would become a K.C.
sentences.cn: 我从来也不会想到他能成为一名王室法律顾问。

jushi.english: A leap-year occurs at every four years.
It occurs more often in women than in men.
jushi.chinese: 此事更经常发生在女性身上,较少地发生在男性身上。
